code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskForm=_ref=>{let{addTask}=_ref;const[taskName,setTaskName]=useState('');const[dueDate,setDueDate]=useState('');const[status,setStatus]=useState('pending');const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const newTask={task_name:taskName,due_date:dueDate,status:status};try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/tasks',newTask);addTask(response.data);setTaskName('');setDueDate('');setStatus('pending');}catch(error){console.error('Error adding task:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Task Name",value:taskName,onChange:e=>setTaskName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:dueDate,onChange:e=>setDueDate(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:status,onChange:e=>setStatus(e.target.value),required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"pending",children:"Pending"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"completed",children:"Completed"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Task"})]});};export default TaskForm;
